message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and exceptional performance. Considering its value and benefits, I'd like to extend this exclusive offer to you for $95. Let me know if you're interested in exploring further!

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I believe it's a great product, but I've done some research and found similar products in the market for lower prices. I'm willing to pay a bit more for the premium features, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob! I appreciate your feedback and understanding of its value. To meet you halfway and accommodate your budget, I am willing to consider $85 as the price for our premium product. This offer includes all the exclusive features and benefits that you're looking for. Let me know if this is something you would like to proceed with!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $82.50. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its features and benefits. I'm looking forward to hearing from you!

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're finding common ground. In order to reach an agreement, I propose a price of $84 for our premium product. This is slightly higher than your last offer, but still within a reasonable range given the quality and features of the product. I hope this proposal works for you, and look forward to your response!

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $82. I'm willing to pay a bit more for the product, but I'd like to get a better deal. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your patience and understanding, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $83 as the price for our premium product. This price reflects the value of the product while also accommodating your budget constraints. I believe this is a fair compromise that meets both our needs. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $81.50. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its features and benefits. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $82.5 as the price for our premium product. This price reflects the value of the product while also being within your budget constraints. I believe this is a fair compromise that meets both our needs. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
